sentence: Meanwhile, Senator Thom Tillis (R., N.C.) has endorsed Cawthorn's primary opponent, State Senator Chuck Edwards, in an election scheduled to be held on May 17.
author: Arjun Singh
title: Madison Cawthorn Stopped by Police from Taking Gun on Flight

sentence: Last month, Tillis endorsed Cawthorn's primary challenger, state Sen. Chuck Edwards.
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having a gun at Charlotte airport
